data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Alien leads Skywalker to a clearing where a platoon of the Imperial guard is lounging, obviously waiting for someone or something. The ____ jumps ____ as a herd ____ Aliens ____ with ____ princess ____ bureaucrats ____ tow. A ____ is ____ and ____ platoon ____ in a `` ____ tank '' with ____ three ____. The general tries to follow, but is unable to keep up.
data.partBlankContent: The Alien leads Skywalker to a clearing where a platoon of the Imperial guard is lounging, obviously waiting for someone or something. The gen____ jumps under_____ as a herd o_ Aliens arr___ with t__ princess a__ bureaucrats i_ tow. A tr___ is ma__ and t__ platoon lea___ in a `` sp___ tank '' with t__ three capt____. The general tries to follow, but is unable to keep up.
data.fullContent: The Alien leads Skywalker to a clearing where a platoon of the Imperial guard is lounging, obviously waiting for someone or something. The general jumps undercover as a herd of Aliens arrive with the princess and bureaucrats in tow. A trade is made and the platoon leaves in a `` speed tank '' with the three captives. The general tries to follow, but is unable to keep up.
data.answer: 外星人带着天行者来到一片空地，那里有一排帝国卫队正在休息，显然是在等待什么人或什么东西。当一群外星人带着公主和官僚们抵达时，将军化做卧底。交易完成后，一排帝国卫队和三个俘虏一起乘坐“高速坦克”离开。将军试图跟上，但跟不上。
